page.title: 16Garage Services near Weston
page.content:
The presence of the main A43 road has attracted several garages, filling stations and cafes to the Weston area. All favour extending the M40 as they anticipate increased business. All of them provide work for local people.
The Lay-by Garage and Transport Cafe is visited each day by some 200 HGV drivers calling for food of whom 10% buy fuel. It is the only transport cafe on the road between Northampton and Southampton. The garage also sells petrol and does accident repairs and local servicing.
Weston Garage does local servicing, repairs and MOTs. The nearby Rey Serv- ice Station opens daily to sell petrol to business and local people. The Little Chef (nationwide chain) sells snack meals to the motoring public.
